Because he performs well in the early game meta. Other than that I don't think he's too insane, gimped by short range and worse teamfighting than other carries. I'm an Ezreal main and Lucian is one adc that I lose to nearly every game, but I don't think he's broken or insane. That's just a matchup I lose by default. Comes down to the fact that that's how the matchup goes; Ezreal's in a bad state, Lucian isn't; if both players are of equal skill, then I'll lose. He is a lane bully, more difficult to play than things like MF, but still very potent.
